name: Safe Cracker (Pastelgrill, A_Shutter, Spiderbrood, Dracloud, AzuliBean)
name_original: Safe Cracker (Pastelgrill, A_Shutter, Spiderbrood, Dracloud, AzuliBean)
description:
Immersive puzzle arcade that casts the player as an aspiring thief who relies on their skills and senses to unlock and crack safes.

(Warning: the game is designed to have physical input)

Created by:

Indre Grigaraviciute - PO & Programmer
Kenny Hwang Chau - Graphics
Marcus Kajimalwendo - Graphics
Aleksandr Poliakov - Project Manager
Georgi Madzharov - Project Manager
Nikita Krivosein - Programmer
Christoffer Johansson- Game Designer
